person.persName: Joseph Pain (Ballard County, Kentucky, common laborer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, common laborer. Tennessee native. Married to Mary L. Dyre Pain on February 27, 1850. Father of Mary Pain, William J. Pain, David Pain, Mira Pain, Bird Pain, Louisa Pain, Benjamin F. Pain, Lucy Pain, and Elizabeth Pain. Farmer in Van Buren County, Tennessee, in 1850. Common laborer in Ballard County in 1860.
